document_data.name: ''Naga Crown''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''naga crowns''''' were powerful [[major artifact]]s that gave their wearers the power to completely control reptiles. They were actually made by the [[yuan-ti]].
document_data.Description: They were triple-spired, silvery metal circlets.
document_data.Abilities:
The wearer of a ''naga crown'' could [[see invisibility|see through invisibility]].

They could also create a magical energy sphere to prevent creatures from coming closer and to reflect [[spell]]s back to the original caster.

Furthermore, if the bearer was an arcane spellcaster, their daily spell allotment was doubled.
